This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Scrapbooks of photographs of campus scenes, classmates and school activities taken while a student at the University of Arizona.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Scrapbooks of Lawrence L. Kriegbaum (AZ 038). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Lawrence L. Kriegbaum, 1966.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks of photographs of campus scenes, classmates and school activities taken while a student at the University of Arizona. Includes photos of the El Paso and Southwestern Railroad Station in Tucson (Ariz.), and photos of travel in California and Oregon.
